name: THE FOOL FALLS INN
description:
Visit the historic Fool Falls Inn today! Many a weary traveler has stopped to rest at this mysterious mountain cabin, and you are invited to join their ranks in an invigorating interactive adventure. 

Make new friends, solve puzzles, and discover places both wonderful and strange such as scenic Magician’s Point, lovely High Lady Lake, enchanted Empress Grove, and the treacherous Ramshead Bridge. Your journey awaits, and it all begins at THE FOOL FALLS INN!
